speaker: Doctor
text: Hi there! How have you been feeling since your last visit?

speaker: Patient
text: I've been okay, but sometimes I feel really tired.

speaker: Doctor
text: I see. Have you noticed any changes in your seizures or any other new symptoms?

speaker: Patient
text: No new seizures, but sometimes I get headaches.

speaker: Doctor
text: Thanks for telling me. The tiredness and headaches could be side effects of the levetiracetam. Have you been taking your medication every day?

speaker: Patient
text: Yes, I take it every morning and night like you said.

speaker: Doctor
text: Great job on taking it regularly. We might need to adjust your dose to help with the tiredness and headaches. How does that sound?

speaker: Patient
text: Okay, if it helps me feel better.
